author: slava77
body:
- MTD track extension variables, track tofPID, and new vertex collections
- additional/new PPS local track variables
- some refactoring of copy-pasted values or calls
- add branch presence check for most of the complex types with more than 1-2 plotted members to cleanup the logs
    - e.g. all_mini comparisons logs reduced by more than a factor of 4 from 1.9 MB to 0.4MB (for a case of no differences)
title: reco comparisons: new PPS and MTD plots; add branch presence check for cleaner logs
